programme.title: Extract
programme.desc: Joel, the owner of an Extract plant, tries to contend with myriad personal and professional problems, such as his potentially unfaithful wife and employees who want to take advantage of him.

programme.title: Dragon Blade
programme.desc: When corrupt Roman leader Tiberius arrives with a giant army to claim the Silk Road, Huo An teams up his army with an elite Legion of defected Roman soldiers led by General Lucius to protect his country and his new friends.

programme.title: High Voltage
programme.desc: A group of young adults decides to rob a bank, only to discover that the bank is just a front for a Korean mob money laundering operation.

programme.title: Caesar
programme.desc: Epic look at Julius Caesar, Romes last dictator, whose death also signaled the end of the Roman Republic. Chronicles his campaigns in Gaul and Egypt, his rivalry with General Pompey, and his eventual assassination at the hands of Brutus and Cassius.

programme.title: House of the Stone Monkeys
programme.desc: The action proceeds along two tracks and two time frames. We meet the boy, who lives with his mother in a Budapest apartment house, in the summer of 2012. Another boy is spending his vacation with his grandparents in the same building in the summer of 1982. The house unveils its mysterious secret to both of them.

programme.title: Nico the Unicorn
programme.desc: A 12-year-old disabled boy, whose father recently passed away, has his life changed when the pony he rescues gives birth to a unicorn. Can he save the unicorn from the people who want to exploit it?

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: The Fire Dragon patrol, with their ever-supportive scoutmaster, is headed to Camp Rakhouta for what should be the best week of their lives. But when the "Team Spirit Stick" of the camp goes missing, the entire tradition of the camp is threatened.

programme.title: The Adventure Scouts
programme.desc: A coming of age movie about a group of boys and girls called "adventure scouts" who return from a camping trip to discover their small town is being held captive by a gang of motorcycle-riding knuckleheads. Using only their scouting knowledge and camping equipment, the kids take down the gang members one by one, reunite with family members, and restore the communitys sense of pride.

programme.title: The Sandman
programme.desc: One fine morning, Benno finds sand in his bed. While he tries to ignore this at first, he soon must realize that he himself is loosing the sand. Day after day the sand increases and soon his time literally starts running short. Finally he is left no choice but to ask Sandra for help, who runs a small coffee shop under his apartment. Although Benno hates her with a passion, he started having dreams of her every night. What could Sandra and the dreams have to do with the sand?

programme.title: The Phantom Father
programme.desc: The Phantom Father tells a story of an American professor Robert Traum, who takes a sabbatical from his teaching job to trace his roots in Romania. Traum soon discovers that he comes from a wealthy family involved in organized crime. He manages to reestablish contact with the sole remaining link to his otherwise deceased family—Sami. Rocco Castoro, the editor-in-chief of VICE magazine called the movie the best Romanian movie hes ever seen.

programme.title: Field of Lost Shoes
programme.desc: Based on a true story of the American Civil War, culminating at the Battle of New Market, May 1864. A group of teenage cadets sheltered from war at the Virginia Military Institute must confront the horrors of an adult world when they are called upon to defend the Shenandoah Valley. Leaving behind their youth, these cadets must decide what they are fighting for.

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: Donald P. Sinclair has placed six separate gold coins in different slot machines in his casino. The lucky six who find these coins discover an opportunity of a lifetime. The chance to own $2 million. Locked up in a locker in New Mexico, these six contestants must now race each other, to be the first to the cash. There are no rules in place and everything that could possibly happen, does. Whilst, behind the scenes, Sinclairs associates are placing their bets.

programme.title: The Humanity Bureau
programme.desc: In the near future our government will decide who is expendable.

programme.title: Unexpected
programme.desc: Music critic Bob is out of a job, addicted to Zoloft, and trying to wrangle the menagerie of animals that his wife Amy has accumulated. Will adopting a baby cure their existential angst? Or should they just rescue another duck?

programme.title: Caesar
programme.desc: Epic look at Julius Caesar, Romes last dictator, whose death also signaled the end of the Roman Republic. Chronicles his campaigns in Gaul and Egypt, his rivalry with General Pompey, and his eventual assassination at the hands of Brutus and Cassius.

programme.title: Delicate Gravity
programme.desc: Paul (Yvan Attal) and Claire (Anne Parillaud) are two lonely people who meet because of a cell phone call to a wrong number. Claire send a message and Paul receives it. The man believes that Claire goes through a breakdown and she might commit suicide. Philippe Andres picture won prizes at festivals in Palm Springs and Nevada.

programme.title: Summer Dreams
programme.desc: Seventeen-year old Robbie Zirpollo has a problem. As the film opens, his mother is driving him to his new summer job. We learn that Robbie has grown up in Oceanside, California, but now he and his mother have moved to Colorado for a fresh start, as his father has taken the familys savings and his secretary to Mexico. Robbies mom has, through an uncle, gotten him a summer job at Water World on the grounds crew. The adventure begins when Robbie meets Alex and gets moved to Aokees Surf and Snack shack to work. Alex convinces Robbie to enter the parks "Employee Olympics" to bring the Surfer King trophy to its rightful place among the concessions crew. Tiffany, the park owners daughter, has other ideas for Robbie.

programme.title: The Lucky Dragon
programme.desc: A young, Chinese dragon punished by the gods to be a mere mortal is cast down to earth. He is forced to make his way in a strange land until the evil forces discover his true identity. Take part in a world full of imagination while following the journey of a mischievous dragon who has been transformed by magic into a little boy and exiled from his home to live among humans. When both good and evil forces learn that a dragon has arrived, they look for him as he is the only one who can find the magical sword—whose owner can rule the universe! Will he find the sword in time before it gets into the wrong hands? Will he ever become a dragon again?

programme.title: Mayor Cupcake
programme.desc: A hard-working cupcake maker is inadvertently elected mayor of a small town burdened with debt. Uneducated, she relies on her street smarts to clean up the town.

programme.title: Answer Me
programme.desc: A drama from 2004 produced in Italy, the script of which was based on the novel by Susanna Tamaro. A couple in love gets married, but when their first-born son comes to the world, the life of a young couple turns into hell.

programme.title: Its a Perfect Night for Suicide
programme.desc: A comedy about a psychic who pretends to believe that magic exists, a gigolo who pretends to believe the psychic, an illusionist who pretends to be somebody else and a desperate woman who believes she will find true happiness in love... when shes dead. Lenka is a psychic who besides telling fortunes is great at depriving her clients of them, with the help of an extraordinary uncle-illusionist. The business flourishes until Lenkas most profitable client, a soulful Buddhist Yvonne, decides to commit suicide. She was jilted by the man of her dreams - Oscar. Whats more, Yvonne wants to leave a suicidal note, pointing to Lenka as the cause of all her misfortunes. Lenkas entire world falls apart. She must dissuade Yvonne from killing herself and in her desperation is ready to use all her magical skills to make Oscar fall in love with Yvonne. However, Lenka doesnt even suspect shes entering the lions den. A dangerous game begins. The full moon is on the rise - and, surprisingly, the magic starts to work for real. It turns out that the scenario written in the stars is not an easy thing to change...

programme.title: Talea
programme.desc: Summertime. Everybody is excited to go on vacation to Italy. Everybody but Jasmin. Jasmin is yearning something. She wants to be with Eva, her mother, from whom she had to live seperately for a long time. For weeks, Jasmin is trying to get close to Eva. She does not give up, even if shes rejected. After an argument, Jasmin runs away from her fosterhome and convinces Eva to leave the city together and go on a trip. The two get closer -- sometimes as friends, sometimes as mother and daughter. A first joint cigarette, a dance in the village disco, wanderings through the woods. But expectations and needs of the girl and her mother are diverging repeatedly, especially when a man attracts Evas attention and disturbs the growing closeness between mother and daughter.

programme.title: Foolproof
programme.desc: Kevin, Samantha and Rob live for Foolproof; their own private club where through high-tech, meticulously thought out and executed plans, they pull off the most impossible of heists - all in theory that is. Theyve never actually done it for real. But all that changes when Leo, a cutthroat British gangster, rips off their foolproof plans for a diamond heist and uses it to successfully execute the robbery. Threatening to implicate them, Leo blackmails them to pull off a robbery worth $20 million in corporate bonds.

programme.title: Miss Nobody
programme.desc: Unlucky in love, living at home with her eccentric mom, and stuck in a dead end secretarial job at Judge Pharmaceuticals, Sarah Jane longs for more out of life. Her surprise promotion to junior executive appears to be just the ticket. But with promotion comes a competitive new world of wily, complicated executives, and Sarah Jane begins to eliminate the competition the only way she knows how - murder. During her climb to the top, she unexpectedly falls for the man of her dreams, Detective Bill Malloy - the cop intent on cracking the case of the mysterious deaths at Judge Pharmaceuticals.

programme.title: The Last Day of August
programme.desc: Dan (Michael Izquierdo) was paralyzed just over a year ago. Following months of recovery and overwhelmed by lifes new realities, he retreated to a family cabin in upstate New York. On the last day of August, his closest friends arrive unannounced to confront him about his recent reclusive and self-destructive behavior. Wanting to support him, yet skeptical of his psychological health, they attempt the tight-rope walk of loving confrontation in the hopes of convincing Dan to return home. Friendships are tested and love reveals itself in this independent drama about breaking down and breaking through. "The Last Day of August" is about the enduring power of love and friendship, and the struggle to overcome the mental and physical barriers that confront those living with addiction and disability. How we react to tragedy defines us, and when loved ones grapple with immense personal suffering, its not always apparent how to respond and whether the help we have to give is the help thats truly needed. This film is a personal examination of how destructive behaviors such as substance abuse and self-isolation emerge from trauma, and how one finds the strength to overcome.

programme.title: People You May Know
programme.desc: People You May Know follows Jed, a 30-something introvert who has managed to abstain from social media until now. When prompted with the gargantuan task of defining who he is, he realizes the life he can fake is much more interesting than the life he actually leads.

programme.title: Headwinds
programme.desc: Sarah tells Paul that she wants out of their marriage; the next day she disappears. A year later and Paul along with their children return to his childhood town to start anew after the loss of his wife and their mother.

programme.title: Trīs musketieri: Milēdija
programme.desc: Musketieri nolemj apvienot spēkus ar noslēpumaino Milēdiju. Viņu plāns ir apturēt ienaidniekus, kamēr Francijas Karaliste ir sašķelta reliģisko karu dēļ un joprojām ir pakļauta britu draudiem.

programme.title: Avota kods
programme.desc: ASV armijas pilots Kolters atmostas Čikāgas piepilsētas vilcienā. Kolters nezina, kas viņš ir, kā viņu sauc un kā ķermenī atrodas. Taču izskatās, ka visi pārējie pasažieri viņu pazīst. Pirms Kolters saprot, kur atrodas, jaudīgs sprādziens iznīcina gan vilcienu, gan visus pasažierus...

programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Restorāna virtuve.

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone filmām.

programme.title: Trīs musketieri: Milēdija
programme.desc: Musketieri nolemj apvienot spēkus ar noslēpumaino Milēdiju. Viņu plāns ir apturēt ienaidniekus, kamēr Francijas Karaliste ir sašķelta reliģisko karu dēļ un joprojām ir pakļauta britu draudiem.

programme.title: Es gribu tevi atpakaļ

programme.title: Avota kods
programme.desc: ASV armijas pilots Kolters atmostas Čikāgas piepilsētas vilcienā. Kolters nezina, kas viņš ir, kā viņu sauc un kā ķermenī atrodas. Taču izskatās, ka visi pārējie pasažieri viņu pazīst. Pirms Kolters saprot, kur atrodas, jaudīgs sprādziens iznīcina gan vilcienu, gan visus pasažierus...

programme.title: Pilnīgi nesaderīgi
programme.desc: Komēdijas žanrā tapis ieskats attiecībās starp turīgu vīrieti un bezdarbnieku ar kriminālu pagātni, kas nolīgts, lai viņam palīdzētu.

programme.title: Dalasas pircēju klubs
programme.desc: Teksasas kovboja Rona Vudrūfa dzīvi satricina pēkšņa diagnoze - HIV pozitīvs. Dzīvot viņam atlikušas 30 dienas. Tolaik, 1985.gadā tikai sāka apzināties AIDS izplatību un to, kā cīnīties ar šo vīrusu. Rons, no kura novērsās daudzi viņa kādreizējie draugi, sāk pats meklēt legālus un nelegālus ārstēšanās veidus... Galveno lomu filmā, kuras pamatā ir patiesi notikumi, atveido Metjū Makkonahijs, viņam līdzās Džereds Leto, Dženifera Gārnere un citi.

programme.title: Zem sudraba ezera
programme.desc: Jauns un neveiksmīgs Sem apmierina noslēpumainu un skaistu sievieti, kas vienu nakti peld savā ēkas baseinā. Kad viņa pēkšņi izzūd nākamajā rītā, Sem iesaista sirreālu kvestu visā Losandželos, lai atšifrētu noslēpumus aiz viņas.

programme.title: La La Land. Kalifornijas sapņi
programme.desc: Mia ir topošā aktrise, kas piestrādā kafejnīcā, pasniedzot latte kafijas filmu zvaigznēm. Viņas mīļotais ir Sebastians, džeza mūziķis, kas mēģina savilkt galus, uzstājoties ar koncertiem šaubīgos un noplukušos bāros. Panākumiem pieaugot, jaunais mīlnieku pāris saskaras ar lēmumiem, kas sāk graut viņu mīlestību. Sapņi, pie kuriem viņi strādājuši tik smagi, nu viņus var izšķirt!

programme.title: Grāmatu un kartupeļu mizu pīrāgu mīļotāju klubs
programme.desc: Pēckara Londonā jaunā rakstniece Džuljeta mēģina atrast sižetu savai nākamajai grāmatai, taču viņai galīgi negribas rakstīt par kara šausmām, bet citi temati šķiet vai nu garlaicīgi, vai nepiemēroti. Viņai palīdz nejaušs gadījums - vēstule no kāda Gērnsijas salas cūkkopja.

programme.title: Chef Grudge Match
programme.desc: Johnny Bananas calls out fellow Worst Cooks in America competitor Mark Long, and Michael Hung settles a grudge with Chris Oh.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: Shift 8: Elevation. In the final hours of the competition, the chefs must cook the best dishes of their lives for a chance at 50,000 and an unforgettable trip to Hawaii.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Super Mega Cakes
programme.desc: Duff Goldmans team and Ashley Holts team battle to make cakes inspired by their best meal ever and featuring hyper realistic food.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 10. Cooking show.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon creates a meal that kids will love. He makes a dairy-free tomato soup with parm crisps, BLT lettuce wraps and chocolate cake donuts.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Crown The Pork. Michael Symon makes pastrami spiced pork chops with braised vegetables and tops devilled eggs with pickled mustard seeds and chives.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Its Simply The Zest. Michael Symon prepares fluke Milanese and keeps things fresh with a shaved courgette salad. Liz tops it all off with a lemon drop martini.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Bakeaway Camp with Martha Stewart
programme.desc: Six amateur bakers are invited to join Martha Stewarts Bakeaway Camp, where they will face a selection of challenges to test their skills in the campsite kitchen. Hosted by former NFL quarterback Jesse Palmer, the show will see if these avid and talented bakers can produce the goods when the pressure is on, and the luxury of a modern kitchen is taken away. After each episode the worst performing baker is removed from the camp and the remaining contestants soldier on. From classic campsite smores to preparing a wedding cake outdoors, the bakers have their culinary clout tested like never before.

programme.desc: For this challenge, Duff Goldmans squad and Timbo Sullivans team create cakes that feature dazzling architectural detail, both inside and outside.

programme.title: BBQ Brawl: Flay V. Symon
programme.desc: Join our hosts, renowned celebrity chefs and restaurateurs Bobby Flay and Michael Symon, as they test the skills of eight expert barbecue connoisseurs. Filmed at the Star Hill Ranch in Austin, Texas, the eight chefs are divided into two teams but, in order to claim first pick for their team, Bobby and Michael go head-to-head in a backyard BBQ challenge. Each episode sees one of the chefs being eliminated from the show until there is only one left, the winner who is awarded the title of Master of Cue. The weekly contests aim to reveal the chefs talents and expose their weaknesses and include tasks such as cooking up a tomahawk rib-eye and taking on a Texas beef challenge.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.desc: Seven courageous bakers are tasked with creating terrifying desserts in this spooky baking competition. Hosted by ventriloquist Jeff Dunham and his sidekick Walter, the competition invites talented bakers to showcase their talents in Halloween-themed challenges. They will have to conjure all of their baking abilities if they are to become the champion, and the winner of the series takes home a frightening $25,000. With a number of prominent judges overseeing their work, there is no room for error, and contestants are eliminated each week until only one remains.

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: BBQ Brawl: Flay V. Symon
programme.desc: Join our hosts, renowned celebrity chefs and restaurateurs Bobby Flay and Michael Symon, as they test the skills of eight expert barbecue connoisseurs. Filmed at the Star Hill Ranch in Austin, Texas, the eight chefs are divided into two teams but, in order to claim first pick for their team, Bobby and Michael go head-to-head in a backyard BBQ challenge. Each episode sees one of the chefs being eliminated from the show until there is only one left, the winner who is awarded the title of Master of Cue. The weekly contests aim to reveal the chefs talents and expose their weaknesses and include tasks such as cooking up a tomahawk rib-eye and taking on a Texas beef challenge.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: In the first shift of 24 nonstop hours, 24 talented chefs take on three challenges testing speed to impress judge Antonia Lofaso.

The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Super Mega Cakes
programme.desc: For this challenge, Duff Goldmans squad and Timbo Sullivans team create cakes that feature dazzling architectural detail, both inside and outside.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Crown The Pork. Michael Symon makes pastrami spiced pork chops with braised vegetables and tops devilled eggs with pickled mustard seeds and chives.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Its Simply The Zest. Michael Symon prepares fluke Milanese and keeps things fresh with a shaved courgette salad. Liz tops it all off with a lemon drop martini.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Cooking - Ep. 1. Cooking show.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Bakeaway Camp with Martha Stewart
programme.desc: Six amateur bakers are invited to join Martha Stewarts Bakeaway Camp, where they will face a selection of challenges to test their skills in the campsite kitchen. Hosted by former NFL quarterback Jesse Palmer, the show will see if these avid and talented bakers can produce the goods when the pressure is on, and the luxury of a modern kitchen is taken away. After each episode the worst performing baker is removed from the camp and the remaining contestants soldier on. From classic campsite smores to preparing a wedding cake outdoors, the bakers have their culinary clout tested like never before.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: The Last Day of the Dictator
The Last Day of the Dictator
Saraksts
programme.desc: Kad viņas līgavainis pārguļ ar slavenību no sava sapņu saraksta, Ebija dodas uz Losandželosu, bruņojusies vienīgi ar pieciem vārdiem un tādām fantāzijām kā miljoniem citu parastu cilvēku, lai pārgulētu ar kādu no sava saraksta.

programme.title: Džeisons Borns
programme.desc: Bijusī CIP slepenā aģente Nikija Pārsone (Džūlija Stailza) reiz palīdzēja Bornam (Mets Deimons), pēc tam nozuda un šobrīd strādā kopā ar ziņotāju, kurš gatavojas nodot atklātībā CIP slepenās specoperācijas. Nikija ielaužas CIP sistēmā un lejupielādē visu, kas saistīts ar specoperācijām, tostarp operāciju "Dzirnakmens", kurā piedalījās Borns. CIP aģente Hetera Lī (Alīsija Vikandere) atklāj ielaušanos un par to ziņo CIP direktoram Robertam Dūvijam (Tomijs Lī Džonss), kurš ir specoperāciju galvenais vadītājs.

programme.title: Modiljāni. Trīs dienas uz neprāta spārniem
programme.desc: Pirmā pasaules kara laikā Parīzē bohēmiskais mākslinieks Modiljāni cenšas izvairīties no bumbām, policistiem, draudzenēm un kritiķiem, pieaugošā izmisumā meklējot mājas savai mākslai.

programme.title: Venoms
programme.desc: Reportiera Edija Broka pētījumu lokā ir tēmas, uz ko valdība piever acis. Veicot žurnālistisko izmeklēšanu, Broks nejauši nonāk kontaktā ar ārpuszemes simbiotu, kas pārņem viņa ķermeni. Savienojumā ar simbiotu Broks iegūst superspējas un kļūst par fascinējošo varoni Venomu. Nu viņam jāsadarbojas ar šo parazītisko dzīvības formu ķermenī, lai izglābtu savu dzīvību.

programme.title: Smurfi
programme.desc: Laipni lūdzam smurfu pasaulē! Burvis Gargamels ir piespiedis smurfus bēgt no dzimtā ciema. Ģimenes komēdija, kurā animācijas filmas varoņi parādās spēlfilmā.

programme.title: Lieliskais Lapsas kungs
programme.desc: Nemaz nepārspīlējot, jāsaka, Lapsas kungs ir lielisks – no deguna līdz pašam astes galam. Viņš dzīvo idillisku dzīvi kopā ar Lapsas kundzi un dēlēnu, un pie viņiem bieži ciemojas krustdēls Kristofersons. Tomēr Lapsa jūt, ka pēc 12 gadu ilgas rāmas dzīves laukos viņā atkal mostas dzīvnieciski instinkti. Drīz viņš dodas vecajās medību takās, lai čieptu vistas un citus labumus no netālu mītošo fermeru kūtīm. Lai gan nekad netiek pieķerts, viņš ar jauno nodarbošanos apdraud ne tikai savu sievu un dēlu, bet arī visas dzīvnieku komūnas mieru un drošību.

programme.title: Rūķi
programme.desc: Hloja un viņas mamma pārvācas – jau ATKAL! Turklāt viņas pārvācas uz necilu, vecu māju, kas pilna ar dārza rūķiem. Drīz Hloja gan atklāj, ka šī māja slēpj biedējošu noslēpumu. Kādu dienu pēc skolas Hloja kopā ar kaimiņu Liamu atklāj, ka rūķi patiesībā ir dzīvi! Kā izrādās, jau gadiem rūķi ir sargājuši planētu no draudīgiem maziem monstriem, kuri iebrukuši mājā caur portālu, kas ved uz citu pasauli. Kad vienīgais līdzeklis, kas varētu palīdzēt uzveikt monstrus, skolā nonāk nepareizajās rokās, Hlojai un Liamam jāsadarbojas ar rūķiem, lai cīnītos pret mazo negantnieku iebrukumu un glābtu pasauli!

programme.title: Karalisks piedāvājums
programme.desc: 2010. gadā pirms Arābu pavasara izmisušam amerikāņu tirgonim Alanam (Toms Henks) pēc mājas zaudēšanas un šķiršanās no sievas dzīvē ir iestājusies krīze. Izmisīgi cenšoties atgūt atpakaļ savu sievu, viņš dodas uz Saūda Arābiju, lai valdībai pārdotu hologrāfisku telekonferences sistēmu. Cieši apņēmies noslēgt līgumu un nepalikt uz sēkļa brūkošā ekonomikā, viņš mācās, kā izturēties svešā kultūrā ar taksometra vadītāja (Aleksandrs Bleks) un vietējā ārsta palīdzību (Sarita Čodrija)

programme.title: Ledus laikmets
programme.desc: Dienā, kad zobenzobu vāveri vajā neveiksmes un viņa gandrīz pazaudē savu lielāko dārgumu ozolzīli, visi dzīvnieki dodas ceļā uz dienvidiem, meklējot glābiņu no aukstuma, kas piemeklējis zemi. Sliņķis Sids un mamuts Manfreds par ceļabiedriem kļūst nejauši. Pēc zobenzobu tīģeru uzbrukuma cilvēku apmetnei viņi izglābj mazuli. Par to rūpes uzņemas citkārt slinkais Sids un diezgan negribīgi arī Manfreds. Nospriežot, ka bērna tētis ir dzīvs, viņi dodas to meklēt. Drīz ceļiniekiem pievienojas arī zobenzobu tīģeris Djego, kura uzdevums ir mazuli nolaupīt. Tā sākas draugu aizraujošais ceļojums, kura laikā visnepiemērotākajos brīžos pie apvāršņa parādās zobenzobu vāvere Skrets, izmisīgi cenzdamās glābt savu ozolzīli.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets 2: atkusnis
programme.desc: Laika ziņas: Tuvākās piecas dienas ir gaidāmi lieli plūdi, kam sekos pasaules gals. Iespējams, nedēļas beigās varētu izlauzties kāds saules stariņš… Mamutam Manijam, sliņķim Sidam, zobenzobu tīģerim Djego, zobenzobu vāverei Skratam un pārējiem Ledus laikmeta iemītniekiem ir sajūta, ka viņu kūstošā pasaule sāk palikt pārāk slapja un ledus kalns, kas apdraud ieleju, tūlīt lūzīs. Taču tā nav vienīgā problēma – Manijs vairs nevēlas būt viens pats, taču ir pamatotas aizdomas, ka viņš ir pēdējais mamuts. Atkal ir jādodas ceļā, kur tiek satikta valdzinoša mamutiene (iespējams, pēdējā visā pasaulē) Elija, kuru pavada uzņēmīgs oposumu pārītis Krešs un Edijs.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets: Lielā sadursme
programme.desc: Skreta (Kriss Vedžs) nepārtrauktie pūliņi noglabāt savu zīli, liek viņam izraisīt negadījumu virkni, kuru rezultātā asteroīdi sāk traukties uz Zemi. Haoss liek Manijam (Rejs Romano), Djego (Deniss Līrijs), Sidam (Džons Legvizamo) un viņu ģimenēm meklēt patvērumu. Piedzīvojumu meklētāja zebiekste Baks (Saimons Pegs) viņus brīdina, ka var sākties masveida izmiršana, kas liek draugiem meklēt jaunu mājvietu, pa ceļam satiekot citus dzīvniekus un apmeklējot eksotiskas vietas.

programme.title: Mazās sievietes
programme.desc: Filmas darbība norisinās Amerikas Pilsoņu kara laikā un vēsta par četru māsu dzīvi – pirmo mīlestību, vilšanos, šķiršanās sāpēm un sava dzīves ceļa meklējumiem, lietām, kas savu aktualitāti nezaudē visos laikos. Filmas pamatā ir amerikāņu rakstnieces Luīzas Mejas Alkotas tāda paša nosaukuma romāns, kas ir sarakstīts pirms pusotra gadsimta un tiek uzskatīts par īstu žanra klasiku.

programme.title: 47 ronini
programme.desc: Kādu dienu medību laikā Ako valdnieks Asano un viņa samuraji mežā atrod kādu vīru un aizved viņu uz pili. Pēc vairākiem gadiem valdnieks Asano rīko turnīru, lai godinātu komandiera ierašanos Ako. Turnīra vakarā valdnieku Asano nobur, lai viņš savainotu Nagato valdnieku Kiru. Komandieris piespriež Asano sodu - pašnāvību. Sapratuši, ka tas bijis valdnieka Kiras ļaunais plāns, samuraji un atradenis, ignorējot komandiera pavēles, dodas atriebties.

programme.title: Lielais Lebovskis
programme.desc: Neveiksminieks un slaists Džefs Lebovskis pārpratuma pēc tiek noturēts par miljonāru Lielo Lebovski. Bagātnieka sieva ir parādā ievērojamu naudas summu ļoti bīstamiem cilvēkiem. Divi pārskaitušies gangsteri ielaužas dīkdienīgā Džefa mājā un apčurā viņa paklāju. Dusmīgais Lebovskis dodas pie sava vārda brāļa, lai piedzītu kompensāciju par sabojāto grīdsegu, protams, iekuļoties virknē nepatikšanu.

programme.title: Izlaušanās spēle
programme.desc: Seši savstarpēji nepazīstami cilvēki saņem ielūgumu piedalīties izlaušanās spēlē, kurā viņiem jāatrod izeja no dažādām telpām. Atrisinot virkni mīklu, veiksmīgais uzvarētājs balvā saņems 10 000 dolāru. Tomēr šķietami nevainīgā jautrība drīz izvēršas cīņā uz dzīvību un nāvi. Sapratuši, ka tam, kurš istabu pamet pēdējais, ir lemts mirt, viņi ir spiesti likt lietā visu savu atjautību, lai izdzīvotu.

programme.title: Iebrukums
programme.desc: Kad kaimiņvalsts Veragva negaidot uzbrūk Kirasao un Arubai, tas pārsteidz Dānijas valdību nesagatavotu. Konflikts strauji attīstās, un trim dāņu komandas biedriem jāsaprot, kā rīkoties pareizi.

programme.title: Naktsmītne
programme.desc: Topošā sieva ar diviem sava līgavaiņa bērniem apmetusies brīvdienu namā kādā attālā ciematā. Attiecībām atsalstot, sāk risināties dīvaini un biedējoši notikumi.

programme.title: Mīluļu slepenā dzīve
programme.desc: Makss (Luiss Sīkejs) ir enerģisks un sajūsmināts Džeka Rasela terjers, kurš dzīvo Manhetenas dzīvoklī kopā ar īpašnieci Keitiju (Elija Kempere). Taču viņa laimīgā dzīve pārtrūkst, kad saimniece pieņem jaunu suni Grāfu (Ēriks Stounstrīts). Makss apņemas atgūt saimnieces uzmanību tikai sev un mēģina Grāfu atstāt kādā sānielā, taču viņus ielenc kaķu banda, kuru vada Ozons (Stīvs Kūgans). Viņi tik tikko izglābj savas dzīvības, kad nākas saskarties ar pamesto dzīvnieku armijas niknumu apburošā, bet psihiski nelīdzsvarotā truša Sniegapikas (Kevins Hārts) vadībā. Šis ir Ņujorkas piedzīvojums, kurš liek Maksam un Grāfam izvērtēt savu sacensību un mēģināt izjaukt Sniegapikas atriebes plānu pret visiem dzīvnieku īpašniekiem Ņujorkā.

programme.title: Mājas
programme.desc: Kad dīvainais citplanētietis Ou (ierunājis Džims Pārsons) avarē uz Zemes, viņam izveidojas neparasta draudzība ar Tipu (ierunājusi Riana), uz piedzīvojumiem kāru, bet aizdomu pilnu meiteni. Šis dīvainais pāris dodas apceļot pasauli, vienlaikus bēgot no Ou ienaidniekiem. Mežonīgajam ceļojumam un abu draudzībai būs izšķiroša loma starpgalaktiskajās attiecībās.

programme.title: 65: Iznīcības robeža
programme.desc: Pēc katastrofālas avārijas uz nezināmas planētas pilots Milss ātri vien aptver, ka viņam un otrai dzīvi palikušajai pasažierei Koai ir tikai vienīga iespēja izglābties – viņiem jātiek pāri nezināmajam apvidum, kuru pārņēmuši bīstami radījumi, un jāliek lietā visi spēki, lai izdzīvotu.

programme.title: Kā pieradināt pūķi
programme.desc: Vikingu pusaudzis Hikaps dzīvo Berkas salā kopā ar savu valdonīgo tēvu. Kaujas ar pūķiem ir vikingu ikdiena un dzīves veids, taču Hikapu tās neaizrauj. Tā vietā viņš labprātāk nododas visvisādiem izgudrojumiem un apkārtnes iepazīšanai. Reiz kādā no saviem klejojumiem Hikaps sastop ievainotu pūķi, kuram palīdz atkal lidot. Šī sastapšanās maina abu dzīves. Un, kad pienāk iesvētību laiks – lielā iespēja kaujā ar pūķiem sevi pierādīt tēvam un visai ciltij –, Hikaps rīkojas pavisam neparasti.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets 4: Kontinentu dreifs
programme.desc: Skrats netīšām izraisa kontinentālu kataklizmu, kuras rezultātā Menijs tiek nošķirts no Elijas un Persikas. Viņš atrodas uz aisberga kopā ar Djego, Sidu un Omīti, taču apņemas atgriezties mājās. Pēc šiem satriecošajiem notikumiem Sids satiek sen neredzētus ģimenes locekļus, turklāt draugiem būs jātiek galā ar dažādiem jauniem personāžiem, kuri apņēmušies liegt viņiem atgriezties mājās.

programme.title: Ledus laikmets 3: Dinozauru ēra
programme.desc: Kas var būt lieliskāks par vismīļāko aizvēsturisko draugu atgriešanos? Šoreiz Manijs ar biedriem atklāj zudušu pasauli, kurā mājo zvērīgi dinozauri. To vidū ir arī īdzīgs tiranozaurs, kam kārtojami īpaši rēķini ar sliņķi Sidu. Arī smieklīgā vāverēna dzīvē pienācis pārmaiņu laiks - viņš sastop neatvairāmi daiļu vāveru jaunkundzi, bet nekad jau nevar tā īsti zināt, vai dāma alkst nolaupīt viņa sirdi vai kvēli dievināto zīli.

programme.title: Mīluļi apvienojas
programme.desc: Klusā, bet ļoti mūsdienīgā pilsētā Robo notiek kas neredzēts un nedzirdēts. Mērs Frenks ir zaudējis prātu. Viņa plāns neiekļaujas nekādos rāmjos. Tikai paklausieties! Viņam apnikuši cilvēki un dzīvnieki, tāpēc viņš savā prātā perina plānu – visus iedzīvotājus un mājdzīvniekus izdzīt no pilsētas un viņu mājas atdot robotiem! Kad suns bez pajumtes Rodžers uzzina šo jaunumu, viņam visas spalvas saceļas stāvus. Šis Robins Huds daudz laika pavadījis uz ielas, nočiepis dažu labu gardas desas luņķi, lai to atdotu vājākiem dzīvniekiem, un nu jūt, ka mēra plāns pie laba gala nenovedīs. No pilsētas pazudīs dzīvība! Atgriezies no jaukas pastaigas kopā ar daiļo Siāmas kaķenīti Bellu, Rodžers šausmās sastingst. Roboti sagrāvuši viņa vienīgo būdiņu! Mukdams, ko nagi nes, Rodžers piepeši satiek labsirdīgo robotu Bobu, kuram arī mēra nodoms šķiet briesmīgs. Ir jārīkojas! Jāglābjas pašiem un jāglābj citi. Ja nekas netiks darīts, greznā mājdzīvnieku viesnīca būs briesmās. Nenojauzdami nekā ļauna, tajā mitinās daudzi četrkājainie.

programme.title: Naudas cena: Largo Vinča piedzīvojums
programme.desc: Largo Vinčs izmisīgi meklē savu nolaupīto dēlu, saprotot, ka pēdas pie tiem, kas izraisījuši viņa bankrotu, varētu aizvest arī pie Largo dēla.

programme.title: Žanna Dibarī. Karaļa favorīte
programme.desc: Stāsts par karaļa Luija XV pēdējo oficiālo mīļāko Dibarī kundzi.

programme.title: Zombijzemē: Otrais šāviens
programme.desc: Nesaudzīgā un bezbailīgā zombiju mednieku četrotne dodas uz Amerikas vidieni, par savu jauno mājvietu atrodot Balto namu. Tur viņi stāsies pretī ne tikai jauna veida dzīvajiem miroņiem, bet arī citiem izdzīvojušajiem, kas nebūt nav draudzīgi noskaņoti. Turklāt viņu pašu vidū rodas nopietnas domstarpības.

programme.title: Jaunais vilks. Filma
programme.desc: Pasaulē parādījies šausminošs ļaunums, un vienīgi vilkači, kā Skots Makols, spēj saliedēt gan jaunos sabiedrotos, gan uzticamos draugus, lai cīnītos pret, iespējams, spēcīgāko un nāvējošāko ienaidnieku, kāds jebkad sastapts.

programme.title: After. Pēc kritiena
programme.desc: Tesa ir gatava jaunam dzīves posmam. Spožais prestižas koledžas diploms paver jaunas iespējas – meitene atrod sapņu darbu starptautiskā kompānijā. Viņas nodoms pārcelties uz Sietlu nemaz neiepriecina Hārdinu. Viņa neapmierinātība, pārmetumi un mūžīgā greizsirdība sāpīgi ievaino Tesu un rada bažas. Vai ir vērts visu likt uz kārts un upurēt daudzsološu karjeru? Taču kā lai aizmirst kopā pavadītās naktis un kaislīgos skūpstus, viņa ciešos vīrieša apskāvienus un tuvību, kas padara traku?

programme.title: Likteņa ironija
programme.desc: Nekustamo īpašumu aģente Margo un advokāts Grifins varētu būt ideāls pāris, diemžēl abi viens par otra eksistenci pat nenojauš. Turklāt dienu pirms Vecgada vakara Margo un Grifins iesāk ar lielām cerībām – viņiem ir īpaši plāni vakaram ar savām otrajām pusītēm. Taču liktenis visu saliks savās vietās: pēc jautras ballītes ar draugiem taksists Grifinu aizvedīs uz norādīto adresi, tikai... nepareizajā pilsētā! To, ka iekļuvis neīstajā namā, viņš sapratīs vien tad, kad mājās pārnāks Margo.

programme.title: NFL. Washington Commanders - Atlanta Falcons
programme.desc: All the action of the National Football League 2020-2021.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Barcelona - Real Sociedad
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Anadolu Efes - Maccabi
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: UFC. Carlos Ulberg-Dominick Reyes
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.desc: The Speedway of Nations is a one-a-year speedway event every time held in a different country. Several national teams compete with each other, every team is represented by two riders, and there is one reserve, that can be used at any time.

programme.title: EuroLeague. Partizan Mozzart Bet Belgrade - EA7 Emporio Armani Milan
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

Home Town
programme.desc: In this home improvement show, watch Ben and Erin Napier renovate old dulling houses in Mississippi, USA to dream homes. The pair are hoping to share their love of the small, historic homes of the town, and also transfer the enthusiasm of renovating a place to other home buyers. But can issues arise with the home replenishments. Since all the houses are extremely old, Ben and Erin do face problems ensuring the house dont get damaged when they work on them, and also that they can keep up with their original up to scratch plans. All the meanwhile they both ensure the homes are renovated at a low budgeted rate. Are they able to create beautiful homes for the people of Mississippi without damaging the infrastructure of the house too much? This fun-loving reality series has been running since 2016.

programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Rehab Addict is a TV show documenting home renovations, hosted by a charming designer Nicole Curtis. Nicole is a strong supporter of the idea of preservation and restoration of existing architecture when possible instead of its destruction. Her philosophy is to "restore old homes to their former glory" rather than modernization. She has revived historic homes in Michigan, Ohio and Minnesota and saved them from the wrecking ball. Nicole deals with the government bureaucrats, creates a team and together they go above and beyond to bring back former glory to the old buildings. Nicole is a bundle of energy and a perfect source of motivation and inspiration.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Singer Jonathan Knight demonstrates his renovation know-how skills. He has renovated more than 200 houses, while preserving their original craftsmanship. He has been in this for more than 25 years, and thanks to his passion and talent he updates interiors while keeping the historical charm and chic.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Christina on the Coast

programme.title: Brother vs. Brother
programme.desc: Property experts Johnathan and Drew Scott compete to complete their renovation projects. Alongside a chosen team of experts, the pair are given a budget of $500,000 and an equal timeline to complete their home renovations. In each episode the teams revamp a different property, which are then judged and valued by an appraiser and real estate expert to assess which property has seen a larger increase in value. The worst performing team member is eliminated from the show after each project, with the last team member standing taking home a $50,000 prize.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Windy City Rehab
programme.desc: Windy City Rehab is a reality renovation show hosted by interior designer Alison Victoria. She and her expert team buy and restore old homes in her beloved Chicago historic neighborhoods. It is much more than a simple improvement of a house. Alison and her team are rescuing vintage houses and hold true to the original style and architecture as much as possible. They do their best to pay tribute to the historic roots, while integrating some modern makeovers.

programme.title: The Flipping El Moussas
programme.desc: Tarek and Heather head to Tareks hometown of Buena Park, California. Tarek looks to turn a sketchy property into a modern family home.

programme.title: The Flipping El Moussas
programme.desc: Tarek and Heather update a cute cottage in Cheviot Hills, California. But theres another flipper a few doors down that could create some fierce competition!

programme.title: Brother vs. Brother
programme.desc: Property experts Johnathan and Drew Scott compete to complete their renovation projects. Alongside a chosen team of experts, the pair are given a budget of $500,000 and an equal timeline to complete their home renovations. In each episode the teams revamp a different property, which are then judged and valued by an appraiser and real estate expert to assess which property has seen a larger increase in value. The worst performing team member is eliminated from the show after each project, with the last team member standing taking home a $50,000 prize.

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: Married team Kamohai and Tristyn Kalama take on house-flipping projects on the island of Oahu, Hawaii, the most difficult flipping location in the US.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home

programme.title: No Demo Reno
programme.desc: After getting married, a couple bought a Tudor home, started a business, and had a baby. Jenn looks to heighten their Tudor vibe and create a cosy space.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Vintage Flip
programme.desc: Jessie and Tina buy a home in the Echo Park area of LA discover there is a second house on the property. Will this flip attract buyers and make a profit?

programme.title: Vintage Flip
programme.desc: Jessie and Tina flip a 1902 cottage in Tinas hometown of Upland, California. They find its lost nearly all of its original Victorian details.

programme.title: Fix My Flip
programme.desc: Two brothers are on their third flip after losses with their last two projects. Page Turner gives them an invaluable lesson in spending money.

programme.title: Rehab Addict Lake House Rescue
programme.desc: Nicoles final challenge for her tiny lake cottage is to fill the cabins new first floor and basement spaces with the historic details she loves.

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: After a year-long wait, Kamohai and Tristyn face a never-ending nightmare after squatters take over a property in Waipahu, causing chaos and delays.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: House Hunters

programme.title: Ancient Aliens Special Presentation
programme.desc: Ancient Astronaut theorists have long proposed that Earth is an extraterrestrial laboratory. If so, does it extend beyond humans into the animal kingdom? Accounts of animalist gods can be found across the globe that curiously mirror alien encounters.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum saddle up and head deep into the heart of Texas! In Fort Worth, the trio unearths a treasure trove including a rare Gretsch White Penguin guitar, a Smith and Wesson revolver, and a "Wonder Man" comic signed by Stan Lee.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are making big deals in the smallest state! In Providence, Rhode Island, the guys cruise over to a muscle car collection, check out a rare book written by John Adams, and take aim at a harpoon gun.

programme.title: Secrets Declassified with David Duchovny
programme.desc: Stealth ops take a heavy toll—especially for agents living double lives in the shadows. From the ultra-secret "Pond" to a Mossad-run diving resort and a daring rescue in Moscow, these covert missions served a greater purpose.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum journey to St. Paul, Minnesota, where they unearth an impressive trilobite fossil collection. Then, Rick grows a heart for a first edition "Tin Woodman of Oz" book, and Chum offers his two cents on an ancient coin collection.

They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum rev up their engines and roll into Detroit, Michigan. With their favourite experts in tow, Rick suits up for some samurai armour and tries to drive down the price of a luxury car collection.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: The hunt for extraordinary deals heats up as Rick, Corey, and Chum make their way down to Mesa, Arizona. Rick encounters a rugged Big Willy Jeep, Chum fangirls over some 2010 Justin Bieber trading cards, and Corey is struck by some Napoleonic medals.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Did ocean scientists discover an unknown life form? Is blurry video of a mysterious creature in the snow the best Yeti footage out there? Did a Las Vegas family have a close encounter with ten-foot-tall aliens in their backyard?

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?
programme.desc: Documentary series exploring the history of Earths greatest man-made structures and creations. Where Did It Come From? reveals the earliest examples of brilliance and ingenuity from past pioneers. From the Roman highway project; a civil engineering feat establishing a network of unprecedented highways, to Egypts iconic structures, this series reveals the incomprehensible ides brought to life by magnificent minds, and in some cases, brutal slavery. Join host Michael Guillen as he dives into this fascinating world of both civil and social engineering, born out of ideas we still use today.

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: Following the release of declassified FBI documents pertaining to the death of Adolf Hitler, a team of world-renowned investigators ask the question of whether he really killed himself in a bunker in Berlin. The report states that "American Army officials in Germany have not located Hitlers body nor is there any reliable source that will say definitely that Hitler is dead." Using modern technology and updated investigation techniques, they will try to define what actually happened to the man who plunged the world into war in 1939. Their investigation will lead them towards a mysterious bunker in Argentina, a missing U-Boat and a potential safe house. Historical documentary series narrated by Dave Hoffman.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: Historical documentary series that visits a range of diverse modern cities including Istanbul, New York, Rome, London, Cairo, and Sydney. By travelling underneath the streets and roads we use today, we learn about the fascinating pasts and ancient secrets of these incredible places.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Lost Gold of WW2
programme.desc: Its said to be the greatest lost treasure from World War II and, in this documentary series, a team of engineers, scientists and investigators attempt to finally locate the loot of General Tomoyuki Yamashita. As the war was drawing to a close, General Yamashita is rumoured to have buried a stolen loot made up of worth hundreds of billions of dollars in Southeast Asia. With the world in a state of disarray and confusion, the loot has been left to sink into the shadows, until now. The team hope to unearth its location using groundbreaking technology, studying three different locations in the Philippines that could hold valuable answers.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: The Loch Ness Monsters possible demise is investigated by Robert Rines, who saw remains while mapping the lake floor. MonsterQuest uses ROVs, sonar, and cameras in search of evidence for Nessies death at the lakes bottom.

programme.title: An Art Lovers Guide
programme.desc: Historical documentary series that visits a range of diverse modern cities including Istanbul, New York, Rome, London, Cairo, and Sydney. programme.title: Doomsday: 10 Ways the World Will End
programme.desc: Theories of how the world will meet its end in this doomsday documentary as we follow scientist Trevor S. Valle as he hypothesises with others through the series. Looking into how the human race will be wiped out with each episode examining a different theory of how the planet will be destroyed. From being swallowed by a black hole, bombed by meteorites or overcome by aliens the series covers the most popular theories. An intriguing and interesting watch that will have you questioning how things out of this world could see the end of the earth.

programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: Gripping and unsettling documentary series that features a team of experts who in each episode examine various footage from news and home video, as well as eyewitness testimony, in order to explain, understand and inform viewers of what actually happened during some of the most devastating natural disasters- including Hurricane Katrina, the earthquake and tsunami that devastated Japan, a monstrous earthquake in Haiti, avalanche of rocks and debris that destroyed a village in Honduras, and many other hurricanes, earthquakes, tsunamis, floodings, droughts and devastating forest fires. They will also investigate how these recent disasters compare and contrast with the most historic natural disasters of the past.

programme.title: Clash of the Gods
programme.desc: Documentary series that in each episode explains the heroic and tragic life of various figures from Greek and Norse mythologies - the most powerful monsters, heroes and Gods, including Thor, Hercules, Beowulf, Minotaur, Odysseus and Zeus. Was ancient Greeces greatest hero Hercules a real person? What inspired the Minotaurs labyrinth? Did Odysseuss famous journey really happen? This series will answer these and many other questions, and experts will connect the myths we all know to actual historical events, and link the stories to mythologies of other cultures as well.

Was ancient Greeces greatest hero Hercules a real person? What inspired the Minotaurs labyrinth? Did Odysseuss famous journey really happen? This series will answer these and many other questions, and experts will connect the myths we all know to actual historical events, and link the stories to mythologies of other cultures as well.

programme.title: Lost Gold of WW2
programme.desc: Its said to be the greatest lost treasure from World War II and, in this documentary series, a team of engineers, scientists and investigators attempt to finally locate the loot of General Tomoyuki Yamashita. As the war was drawing to a close, General Yamashita is rumoured to have buried a stolen loot made up of worth hundreds of billions of dollars in Southeast Asia. With the world in a state of disarray and confusion, the loot has been left to sink into the shadows, until now. The team hope to unearth its location using groundbreaking technology, studying three different locations in the Philippines that could hold valuable answers.

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: The Loch Ness Monsters possible demise is investigated by Robert Rines, who saw remains while mapping the lake floor. MonsterQuest uses ROVs, sonar, and cameras in search of evidence for Nessies death at the lakes bottom.

programme.title: Murder In the Heartland
programme.desc: This series focuses on the dark underbelly of the American mid-west, its heartland. Each episode deals with a specific murder thats been commited in one of the small towns that make up this iconic region of the US with the locals enhancing the tales and bringing clues to our attention. The show includes interviews with the victims family, friends, law enforcement officers and also provides dramatic reenactments to bring the stories to life. Episodes reveal true stories such as when an Oklahoma familys dog drops a human skull onto their porch and the police are called in to investigate; a bride-to-be who discovers her betrothed shot in the head in their living room; a beloved father, son and fiancee who is discovered beaten to death in his own driveway; and a devoted family man who diappears after his truck is set on fire.

programme.desc: A captivating documentary series exploring real-life murder cases, and as the evidence slowly unfolds, viewers are left guessing the identity of the killer. Each episode flashes forward to the engrossing courtroom proceedings, whilst in the meantime the mystery of the chilling murder is slowly being unravelled, and each new clue presents a possible new culprit. With each twist and turn, the truth begins to emerge, before a damning piece of new evidence or testimony flips the case on its head once more.

programme.title: Where Murder Lies
programme.desc: True-crime docuseries that tells the stories of various murder cases that were full of secrets and that shocked everyone once they were resolved and truth came out. Series includes re-enactments and first-person interviews.

programme.title: Real Time Crime
programme.desc: Mississippi police turn to city-run cameras to identify suspects of a shooting spree. In Utah, a missing persons case becomes a murder investigation.

programme.title: Real Time Crime
programme.desc: When a man is shot dead on the Fourth of July, detectives use social media to track down the killer. In Washington, police investigate a raging fire.

programme.title: I Almost Got Away With It
programme.desc: Different crimes, different stories one clear motive: to stay out of prison. This series profiles true stories of the accused, who tried to avoided arrest and capture for their crime. Almost getting away with it. Following these convicts and their attempts and successions of escaping American prisons after being sentenced. Some are on the run for only a week, others evade the law for years and in rare cases even for decades. What pushed these fugitives to crime and to what extent are willing to go to avoid justice.

programme.title: Murder Calls
programme.desc: Murder Calls is a true-crime documentary series that explores the importance of the 911 calls made to the emergency services. Each episode features the chilling calls themselves, as detectives and investigators use the given information to help them track, trace and identify the potential killers. Using extensive reenactments, Murder Calls recreates aspects of the haunting murders, showing the twists and turns detectives face as they aim to understand the motive and identify the culprits. As with many murder cases, nothing at first is what it seems.

programme.title: 911: Did the Killer Call?

programme.title: Murder In the Heartland
programme.desc: This series focuses on the dark underbelly of the American mid-west, its heartland. Each episode deals with a specific murder thats been commited in one of the small towns that make up this iconic region of the US with the locals enhancing the tales and bringing clues to our attention. The show includes interviews with the victims family, friends, law enforcement officers and also provides dramatic reenactments to bring the stories to life. Episodes reveal true stories such as when an Oklahoma familys dog drops a human skull onto their porch and the police are called in to investigate; a bride-to-be who discovers her betrothed shot in the head in their living room; a beloved father, son and fiancee who is discovered beaten to death in his own driveway; and a devoted family man who diappears after his truck is set on fire.

programme.title: Who Killed Jane Doe?

With dramatised reconstructions to portray the events as they happened, each episode focusses on a different, chilling murder, listening to both the professional and personal side of a murder investigation. Whilst detectives scour crime scenes for evidence and clues to identify a victim, a family is waiting in vain for the impending announcement, aware of who the victim could very well be. programme.title: Reasonable Doubt
programme.desc: As we all know, the initial verdict in a trial is not always the final outcome as many trial jury decisions are often overturned on appeal. However, the appeals process can take a significant amount of time to go through the system and also incur enormous costs on the individuals involved. This show follows the work of two investigators who re-examine the verdicts in contentious murder cases and assess the prospects of a successful appeal for the families of the people convicted of the crimes to determine if they should appeal or accept the verdict. Each episode traces the developments in the case, whether it be new evidence or witness testimony, which can then shed light on the innocence of the convicted person or show that, indeed, they are guilty of the crime and the verdict was correct.
